workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.18392656609489522 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.20869284646239677 --weight-decay 0.00033566970552737185 --lr 1e-9 --lr-scheduler triangular --min-lr 1e-10 --max-lr 9.883620194532515e-05 --lr-period-updates 148343.13591067353 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.18783707845544514 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
